data.name: RemovePupilOtherMissingInEducation.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to include

  • Efforts to locate pupil
  • Evidence from the local authority that the pupil is missing in education
  • When the pupil was reported to the police as missing - if not reported please provide reason why
  • Reason for pupil missing from education (if known)
  • Awareness of pupil sitting key stage 4 qualifications

data.name: RemovePupilOtherInPrisonRemandCentreSecureUnitRule.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to provide:

  • Dates spent in prison/ remand centre/secure unit
  • Details of prison/ remand centre/secure unit

data.name: RemovePupilOtherElectiveHomeEducationRule.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to provide:

  • A copy of the parental letter withdrawing the pupil from school

data.name: RemovePupilOtherPermanentlyExcluded.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to include:

  • Timing and outcome of any review process
  • The DfE number or name and postcode of the educational establishment pupil went on to or came from.

data.name: RemovePupilOtherPoliceInvolvementBailRule.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to provide:

  • Date of incident
  • Crime reference number
  • Police report
  • Restrictions put in place which prevented pupil accessing education
  • Alternative education provided

data.name: RemovePupilOtherSafeguardingFapRule.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to provide:

  • Evidence from the governing body, MAT or local authority giving the timing of the move and the reason why the pupil was placed in your school

data.name: RemovePupilOtherTerminalLongIllnessRule.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to provide:

  • Recent supporting statement from a medical professional stating pupil unable to attend school/sit exams and medical evidence to support long term illness
  • % Attendance - Yr 10
  • % Attendance - Yr 11
  • Details of support provided to pupil by school
  • Details of home or hospital tuition: how many weeks/hours per week
  • Name of the hospital where the pupil was an inpatient and unable to study
  • Dates when the pupil was an inpatient, or held in a secure hospital under the Mental Health Act

data.name: RemovePupilPermanentlyLeftEngland.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to provide:

  • Parent Letter
  • Letter from School to LA
  • Evidence of enrolment in non-UK school

data.name: RemovePupilOtherEalExceptionalCirumstances.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to provide:

  • Details of any large gap between the pupil arriving from overseas and being placed in an English school, for example awaiting immigration status.

data.name: RemovePupilAdmittedFollowingPermanentExclusionEvidence.HTML
data.value:
Evidence to provide:

  • Head Teacher notification letter to parent
  • Evidence of review outcome

data.name: RemovePupilDualRegExplainDetailsLabel
data.value: Please explain why this pupil was on your roll

data.name: RemovePupilDualRegLAESTABError
data.value: Enter pupil's main school LAESTAB

data.name: RemovePupilDualRegEvidence
data.value:
Evidence to provide:

  • Evidence supporting the request from an official authority i.e. the LA, other establishment clearly showing that funding has been forwarded
